title: Investition im Rahmen der Impact Facility

extraction_metadata.note: Richtlinie is very short (only 'Informationen von KfW Capital Stand: Juni 2025')

entity_type.ontology_match: ⚠️ MISMATCH - foerderberechtigte says 'Unternehmen' but actual eligibility is VC funds only
entity_type.note: This is fund-of-funds, not direct company investment

region.ontology_match: ✅ PERFECT - But needs nuance: fund can be EU-wide, but must invest in DE companies

funding_type.ontology_match: ✅ PERFECT - Equity investment in VC funds

sme_required.notes: Not applicable - this is fund-of-funds, not company-level
sme_required.ontology_match: ✅ CORRECT - But semantically wrong level (fund vs company)

excludes_companies_in_difficulty.notes: Not mentioned - likely because target companies are young/innovative

startup_friendly.quote: Die Zielfonds investieren in junge, innovative und technologieorientierte Unternehmen
startup_friendly.ontology_match: ✅ PERFECT - Keywords 'junge' and 'innovative' clearly indicate startup focus

funding_amount.quote: Die VC-Fonds können aus Mitteln der Fazilität bis maximal 15.000.000 EUR beziehungsweise bis zu 25 Prozent ihres Fondsvolumens erhalten
funding_amount.ontology_match: ⚠️ COMPLEX - Max is €15M OR 25% (whichever is lower), not simple number

collateral_required.notes: Not mentioned - equity investment doesn't require collateral

company_age_max_years.notes: Target companies described as 'junge' (young) but no specific number
company_age_max_years.ontology_match: ⚠️ AMBIGUOUS - 'jung' implies age limit but not stated explicitly

sfdr_classification_required.quote: Die Zielfonds müssen klassifiziert sein nach Artikel 8 oder 9 der Sustainable Finance Disclosure Regulation (SFDR)
sfdr_classification_required.occurrence_estimate: LOW-MEDIUM - Only for ESG/Impact/sustainable investment programs
sfdr_classification_required.user_value: Hard requirement for sustainable finance compliance
sfdr_classification_required.check_frequency: Unknown - need to query how many programs mention SFDR, Article 8/9, or ESG requirements

impact_measurement_required.quote: Darlegen der eigenen Wirkungslogik... Definition von wirkungsbezogenen Zielen... Impact-Carry
impact_measurement_required.occurrence_estimate: LOW - Specific to impact investing programs
impact_measurement_required.recommendation: ⭐⭐ MAYBE - Too niche unless many impact programs exist

fund_of_funds_structure.notes: Invests in VC funds, not directly in companies
fund_of_funds_structure.occurrence_estimate: LOW - Most programs are direct investment
fund_of_funds_structure.discriminatory_power: HIGH - Different target audience (fund managers vs companies)
fund_of_funds_structure.recommendation: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ ADD - Critical distinction for entity_type taxonomy

geographic_investment_mandate.quote: Hierbei muss mindestens die von KfW Capital investierte Summe in Unternehmen mit Sitz in Deutschland investiert werden
geographic_investment_mandate.occurrence_estimate: MEDIUM - Many federal programs have German investment requirements

due_diligence_process.quote: durchlaufen die VC-Fonds die marktübliche Due Diligence (DD) von KfW Capital, unter ausgeweiteter Prüfung der Impact-bezogenen Fähigkeiten
due_diligence_process.occurrence_estimate: MEDIUM - Many government investment programs have DD
due_diligence_process.discriminatory_power: NONE - Not a filter criterion, just process info
due_diligence_process.recommendation: ❌ REJECT - Procedural detail, not eligibility constraint

independent_fund_management_required.quote: Die Zielfonds haben ein unabhängiges privates Management
independent_fund_management_required.occurrence_estimate: LOW - Specific to fund investment programs
independent_fund_management_required.recommendation: ⭐⭐ MAYBE - Only if we have >50 fund investment programs

track_record_required.quote: welches für die Investitionsstrategie relevante (Impact-)Erfahrung und Track Record vorweisen kann
track_record_required.occurrence_estimate: MEDIUM - Many investment/financing programs require experience

extracted_heuristics_final.entity_type_note: Actual eligibility is VC funds, but foerderberechtigte incorrectly says 'Unternehmen'
